official-title.#text:
To prohibit performance awards in the Senior Executive
		  Service during sequestration periods.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Oversight and Government
			 Reform

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Prohibition on performance
			 awards in the Senior Executive Service

term.#tail:
have the meanings given
			 such terms in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act/s:251

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
251A of the Balanced
			 Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act/s:251A

term.#tail:
means a period beginning on the date on which
			 a sequestration order is issued under

text.#text:
Notwithstanding
			 any other provision of law, an agency may not pay a performance award under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act/s:251

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
251A of the Balanced Budget
			 and Emergency Deficit Control Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act/s:251A

text.#text:
that relates to
			 any period of service performed during a fiscal year during which a
			 sequestration order is issued under

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2222 IH: To prohibit performance awards in the Senior Executive Service during sequestration periods.
